raw_affiliation_strings: Kelly K. Chaves is a doctoral candidate at the University of New Brunswick. Her research demonstrates that the clash of European and indigenous cultures in colonial North America was, essentially, a confrontation between maritime equals fighting over which group of maritime people would control the littoral. Her work has been published in the Northern Mariner, Coriolis, and The Historian.
